title: Error: DuplicateDistinctLog - spam
body:
When syncing both Mainnet and Pyrmont this error get spammed continuously for sustained periods of time
```
2021-01-19 21:11:49 [ETH1]            error: Error updating eth1 chain cache message=DuplicateDistinctLog
Error: DuplicateDistinctLog
    at Eth1DepositsCache.add (/usr/app/packages/lodestar/src/eth1/eth1DepositsCache.ts:42:15)
    at runMicrotasks (<anonymous>)
    at processTicksAndRejections (internal/process/task_queues.js:93:5)
    at Eth1ForBlockProduction.updateDepositCache (/usr/app/packages/lodestar/src/eth1/eth1ForBlockProduction.ts:149:5)
    at Eth1ForBlockProduction.update (/usr/app/packages/lodestar/src/eth1/eth1ForBlockProduction.ts:132:31)
    at Eth1ForBlockProduction.runAutoUpdate (/usr/app/packages/lodestar/src/eth1/eth1ForBlockProduction.ts:114:28)
2021-01-19 21:11:50 [ETH1]            error: Error updating eth1 chain cache message=DuplicateDistinctLog
Error: DuplicateDistinctLog
    at Eth1DepositsCache.add (/usr/app/packages/lodestar/src/eth1/eth1DepositsCache.ts:42:15)
    at runMicrotasks (<anonymous>)
    at processTicksAndRejections (internal/process/task_queues.js:93:5)

Error: DuplicateDistinctLog
    at Eth1DepositsCache.add (/usr/app/packages/lodestar/src/eth1/eth1DepositsCache.ts:42:15)
    at runMicrotasks (<anonymous>)
    at processTicksAndRejections (internal/process/task_queues.js:93:5)
    at Eth1ForBlockProduction.updateDepositCache (/usr/app/packages/lodestar/src/eth1/eth1ForBlockProduction.ts:149:5)
    at Eth1ForBlockProduction.update (/usr/app/packages/lodestar/src/eth1/eth1ForBlockProduction.ts:132:31)
```
